sky.engine.geometry
Class Angle

java.lang.Object
  sky.engine.geometry.Angle

public abstract class Angle
extends java.lang.Object

This class is abstract and helps make accessing angles faster. To do this, we store, say, 360 angle values of Sin, Cos and Tan into an indexable array.

Author:
Matthew Kelly (Badgerati).
